data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Throw-in Gil Vicente.
In the minute 1, Free kick for Gil Vicente in their own half.
Ball safe as Tondela is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Gil Vicente.
In the minute 4, Miguel Bertolo Nogueira signals a Tondela throw-in in Gil Vicente's half.
Miguel Bertolo Nogueira awards the home team a throw-in.
Gil Vicente have been awarded a corner by Miguel Bertolo Nogueira.
In the minute 7, In Barcelos, Ruben Fernandes (Gil Vicente) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Throw-in for Gil Vicente in their own half.
Gil Vicente awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Tondela at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos.
Miguel Bertolo Nogueira signals a throw-in for Gil Vicente, close to Tondela's area.
Corner awarded to Gil Vicente.
In the minute 10, Throw-in for Tondela in their own half.
In Barcelos Gil Vicente's Samuel Dias Lino is caught offside.
In the minute 12, Free kick for Gil Vicente in the half of Tondela.
Babacar Niasse Mbaye Tondela.
Gil Vicenteâ€™s Antoine Leautey is on his feet again at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos.
The match at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos has been interrupted briefly for a check on Antoine Leautey, who is down injured.
In the minute 14, The away team replace Ruben Fonseca with Pedro Trigueira.
Gil Vicente's Joao Talocha gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Tondela defender.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 16, Miguel Bertolo Nogueira signals a free kick to Tondela in their own half.
Corner awarded to Tondela.
Rafael Barbosa of Tondela gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 17, Gil Vicente have a goal kick.
Antoine Leautey for Gil Vicente gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Tondela at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos.
In the minute 18, Miguel Bertolo Nogueira blows against Gil Vicente's Antoine Leautey for offside.
Tondela's Salvador Agra has run offside.
Throw-in for Tondela at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos.
In the minute 24, Gil Vicente have been awarded a corner by Miguel Bertolo Nogueira.
Gil Vicente have been awarded a corner by Miguel Bertolo Nogueira.
Throw-in high up the field for Gil Vicente in Barcelos.
In the minute 25, Samuel Dias Lino puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
Tondela awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Tondela awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 27, Miguel Bertolo Nogueira signals a free kick to Tondela.
Gil Vicente's Samuel Dias Lino is whistled for offside at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos.
Free kick for Gil Vicente in their own half.
In the minute 30, Tondela awarded a free kick in their own half.
Miguel Bertolo Nogueira signals a free kick to Tondela in their own half.
In Barcelos a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 34, Ball safe as Tondela is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Tondela.
Gil Vicente awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 36, Miguel Bertolo Nogueira awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Gil Vicente in the half of Tondela.
In Barcelos a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 40, Gil Vicente drive forward but Samuel Dias Lino is judged offside.
Throw-in for Gil Vicente in their own half.
In the minute 41, Free kick for Tondela in the half of Gil Vicente.
At Estadio Cidade de Barcelos, Nogueira has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Miguel Bertolo Nogueira waits before resuming play because Rafael Barbosa for Tondela is still down.
Rafael Barbosa returns to the field for Tondela after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 43, Free kick Gil Vicente.
Can Gil Vicente capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Tondela's half?
It's a goal kick for the home team in Barcelos.
In the minute 45, Tondela awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Miguel Bertolo Nogueira signals a free kick to Tondela in their own half.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Free kick for Gil Vicente in their own half.
Antoine Leautey for Gil Vicente is whistled offside.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos.
In the minute 45, Tondela's Pedro Augusto has been booked in Barcelos.
The second-half is now underway.
Throw-in for Gil Vicente at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos.
Mohamed Naoufel Khacef is on a sub for Jota for Tondela.
In the minute 46, Tondela make their third substitution with Souleymane Anne replacing Rafael Barbosa.
Miguel Bertolo Nogueira awards Tondela a goal kick.
In the minute 48, Ball safe as Gil Vicente is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Barcelos, Joel Pereira of Gil Vicente is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Antoine Leautey of Gil Vicente is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 49, Throw-in Tondela.
Can Tondela get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gil Vicente's half?
Tondela have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 50, Miguel Bertolo Nogueira awards the home team a throw-in.
Jhon Murillo is replacing Bebeto for Tondela at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos.
Filipe Ferreira grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos.
In the minute 59, Gil Vicente to take a throw-in in Tondela territory.
Gil Vicente drives forward and Antoine Leautey gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Gil Vicente's Claude Goncalves gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 60, Ball goes out of play for a Tondela goal kick.
Gil Vicente are coming forward and Lourency gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Tondela goal kick.
In the minute 61, Throw-in for Gil Vicente at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos.
Gil Vicente awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Miguel Bertolo Nogueira signals a free kick to Gil Vicente.
In the minute 63, Jhon Murillo for Tondela has been booked by Miguel Bertolo Nogueira and receives a first yellow card.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Barcelos.
Miguel Bertolo Nogueira awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 65, In Barcelos a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Souleymane Anne for Tondela who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Tondela's Souleymane Anne is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 68, Miguel Bertolo Nogueira awards Tondela a goal kick.
Free kick for Gil Vicente in the half of Tondela.
Free kick for Tondela in their own half.
In the minute 70, Gil Vicente's Claude Goncalves misses with an attempt on goal.
Tondela have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Tondela close to the penalty box.
In the minute 73, Tondela needs to be cautious. Gil Vicente have an attacking throw-in.
Rui Almeida (Gil Vicente) is making a first substitution, with Joao Afonso replacing Nogueira.
The home team have replaced Antoine Leautey with Kanya Fujimoto. This is the second substitution made today by Rui Almeida.
Tondela awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 75, Joao Afonso (Gil Vicente) has received a first yellow card.
Miguel Bertolo Nogueira signals a free kick to Tondela in their own half.
In the minute 77, Throw-in for Tondela in their own half.
Rui Almeida is making the team's third substitution at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos with Renan Oliveira replacing Lourency.
Gil Vicente awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Gil Vicente in their own half.
In the minute 78, Mohamed Naoufel Khacef (Tondela) has received a yellow card from Miguel Bertolo Nogueira.
Joao Jaquite is replacing Joao Mendes for the away team.
In the minute 80, Throw-in Tondela.
Miguel Bertolo Nogueira signals a free kick to Tondela in their own half.
Ball safe as Gil Vicente is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 82, Miguel Bertolo Nogueira awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Tondela in their own half.
Throw-in Tondela.
In the minute 83, Free kick Gil Vicente.
Corner awarded to Gil Vicente.
Throw-in high up the field for Gil Vicente in Barcelos.
In the minute 85, Gil Vicente are pushing forward but Kanya Fujimoto's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Tondela at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos.
Miguel Bertolo Nogueira signals a free kick to Tondela.
Yves Baraye is replacing Samuel Dias Lino for the home team.
In the minute 86, The home team have replaced Lucas Mineiro with Vitor Carvalho. This is the fifth substitution made today by Rui Almeida.
Miguel Bertolo Nogueira signals a free kick to Tondela in their own half.
In the minute 88, Pedro Trigueira is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Tondela's Pedro Trigueira looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Tondela needs to be cautious. Gil Vicente have an attacking throw-in.
The fourth official's board shows 8 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Gil Vicente awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Miguel Bertolo Nogueira signals a free kick to Gil Vicente.
Goal kick for Tondela at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos.
Gil Vicente surge into the attack at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos but Yves Barayeâ€™s header is off-target.
Tondela have a goal kick.
Free kick for Tondela in their own half.
In Barcelos a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Miguel Bertolo Nogueira signals a Gil Vicente throw-in in Tondela's half.
Can Gil Vicente capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Tondela's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Tondela goal kick.
Free kick for Tondela in the half of Gil Vicente.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-1.
